tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (5)  Tough Grader (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Gives good feedback (3)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)
stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  TOUGH GRADER
comments: he can be very curt with how he words things, but he never says something that isn\'t right per say. Difficult grading makes you really work for it and it\'s super rewarding when you nail an assignment. He remembers you specifically and gives specific advice and examples to look at as an artist. Straight forward, I take classes he teaches still.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (5)  Tough Grader (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Gives good feedback (3)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  LOTS OF HOMEWORK
comments: Tough grader and wants everything done a certain way, but he\'s a really good teacher. Listen to his feedback! He\'s helping, not putting you down. Homeworks are a lot of work &require a lot of time in the studio outside of class. I took him 2 semesters in a row because my skills really did improve, and it\'s because of how structured his class is.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (5)  Tough Grader (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Gives good feedback (3)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  LOTS OF HOMEWORK  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: Yes, he\'s a tough grader and wants everything done a certain way, but he\'s a really good teacher. His classes & homework are extremely structured. Listen to his feedback! He\'s helping, not putting you down. Homeworks are a lot of work &require a lot of time in the studio outside of class. It\'s best if you\'re someone who picks up on thing quickly...

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (5)  Tough Grader (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Gives good feedback (3)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)
stu_tags: TOUGH GRADER  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: Very intimidating, criticizes you more than helps, and extremely unapproachable. Got a D just like he should for his teaching. Unless you\'re an amazing drawer, don\'t take him. Effort means nothing to him.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (5)  Tough Grader (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Gives good feedback (3)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)
stu_tags: PARTICIPATION MATTERS  TOUGH GRADER  LOTS OF HOMEWORK
comments: Schwab is a VERY serious man. Don\'t let his attractive face fool you, the man is there to teach and you will be taught. I personally struggled in his class, but he provided a drawing tutor for us to meet with every other day. He is a tough grader and you MUST participate in critiques, he also gives homework and a test. Just give it your 110%.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (5)  Tough Grader (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Gives good feedback (3)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  INSPIRATIONAL  TOUGH GRADER
comments: This man is an extremely tough grader. That being said, if you actually put the time in, and you actually listen to what he has to say when he\'s trying to help you, you will do good. I used to use a tracer at my highschool to draw and he taught me how to draw completely from scratch. I loved this class, I wish I had him again. Plus he\'s cute :)

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (5)  Tough Grader (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Gives good feedback (3)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Overall, he did help his students to become better drawers but the way he went about it was horrible. He was extremely rude and not personable at all. He was the toughest grader which was very frustrating. dont expect to get anywhere close to an A in the class..good luck to who ever takes his class.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (5)  Tough Grader (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Gives good feedback (3)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Great teacher! He is hard and very straightforward when it comes to critiques but he WILL make you a better artist

comments: Easily my favorite teacher ever, I can\'t say enough. Brilliant and so helpful as long as you put in the time and effort, you\'re going to develop and improve so much.
